title: Do vaccines cause chronic illness or other long-term health problems?
cleaned_text: illness or other long-term health problems? Answer: - There is no evidence that vaccines cause health problems such as autism, asthma, SIDS, or autoimmune diseases such as diabetes and multiple sclerosis. - We learn about a vaccine's safety during clinical trials before it is approved and monitor it's safety continually as millions of doses are administered after its approval. - We've been monitoring the safety of vaccines for more than 50 years and we can say that the chance a vaccine will cause unexpected long-term health problems is extremely low.
